text: Billy Herrington (July 14, 1969 â€“ March 3, 2018) was an American pornographic movie actor and bodybuilder. He was born in North Babylon, New York. Herrington was best known for his work in gay pornography. He was bisexual. He was known for his role in HotMen CoolBoyz (2000). Occasionally, Herrington performed striptease acts at gay clubs in the United States. On March 3, 2018, Herrington was killed in a car accident in California at the age of 48. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:American pornographic actors Category:Bisexual people Category:American bodybuilders Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT people from New York (state) Category:Road accident deaths in California
title: Billy Herrington
